column1: Smoque BBQ////Finally a place that lives up to the hype! This was a last-minute dinner decision
column2: and I was really surprised to find the place packed
column4: on a Thursday night. We pretty much had to wait out the door
column5: but surprisingly things kept moving. 30 minutes
column6: and many edited dinner options later
column7: I finally decided to go with the Brisket Platter with the BBQ Beans and Peach Cobbler. Holy yum. Full of flavor and delicious-highly recommend.
